mapper.select: SELECT user_id, name, gender, email, profile_img, user_type, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status FROM tb_person_info WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_person_info( name, gender, email, profile_img, user_type, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status) VALUES (#{name},#{gender},#{email},#{profileImg},#{userType},#{createTime},#{lastEditTime},#{enableStatus})
